testsuite.name: oradb::installdb CentOS local oradb install database

testcase.name: oradb::installdb CentOS local oradb install database should contain Exec[install oracle database 11.2.0.4_Linux-x86-64] with command => "/bin/sh -c 'unset DISPLAY;/install/p13390677_112040_Linux-x86-64/database/runInstaller -silent -waitforcompletion -ignoreSysPrereqs -ignorePrereq -responseFile /install/db_install_11.2.0.4.rsp'", creates => "/oracle/product/11.2/db/dbs" and group => "oinstall"
